mapper.select: SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.sort.mapper.SortInptPrfmncMapper.selectSortInptPrfmnc */ SIP.APC_CD AS APC_CD , SIP.WRHSNO AS WRHSNO , SIP.INPT_SN AS INPT_SN , SIP.INPT_YMD AS INPT_YMD , SIP.QNTT AS QNTT , SIP.WGHT AS WGHT , SIP.SORTNO AS SORTNO , SIP.SORT_CMNDNO AS SORT_CMNDNO , SIP.RMRK AS RMRK , SIP.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN FROM TB_SORT_INPT_PRFMNC SIP WHERE SIP.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND SIP.WRHSNO = #{wrhsno} AND SIP.INPT_SN = #{inptSn}

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.sort.mapper.SortInptPrfmncMapper.selectSortInptPrfmncList */ SIP.APC_CD AS APC_CD , SIP.WRHSNO AS WRHSNO , SIP.INPT_YMD AS INPT_YMD , SIP.QNTT AS QNTT , SIP.WGHT AS WGHT , SIP.SORTNO AS SORTNO , SIP.SORT_CMNDNO AS SORT_CMNDNO , SIP.RMRK AS RMRK , SIP.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN FROM TB_SORT_INPT_PRFMNC SIP WHERE SIP.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND SIP.WRHSNO = #{wrhsno}

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.sort.mapper.SortInptPrfmncMapper.selectSortInptCnclList */ SIP.APC_CD AS APC_CD , SIP.WRHSNO AS WRHSNO , SIP.INPT_SN AS INPT_SN , SIP.INPT_YMD AS INPT_YMD , SIP.QNTT AS QNTT , SIP.WGHT AS WGHT , SIP.SORTNO AS SORTNO , SIP.SORT_CMNDNO AS SORT_CMNDNO , SIP.RMRK AS RMRK , SIP.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN FROM TB_SORT_INPT_PRFMNC SIP WHERE SIP.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND SIP.SORTNO = #{sortno}

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.sort.mapper.SortInptPrfmncMapper.selectSortInptList */ pt0.* , (SELECT FN_GET_PRDCR_NM(pt0.PRDCR_CD, pt0.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS PRDCR_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_ITEM_NM(pt0.ITEM_CD, pt0.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_VRTY_NM(pt0.ITEM_CD, pt0.VRTY_CD, pt0.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS VRTY_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_GRD_NM_RAWMTR(pt0.APC_CD, pt0.ITEM_CD, pt0.GRD_CD) FROM DUAL) AS GRD_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('SORT_FCLT_CD', pt0.FCLT_CD, pt0.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS FCLT_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('WAREHOUSE_SE_CD', pt0.WAREHOUSE_SE_CD, pt0.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS WAREHOUSE_SE_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('GDS_SE_CD', pt0.GDS_SE_CD) FROM DUAL) AS GDS_SE_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('WRHS_SE_CD', pt0.WRHS_SE_CD) FROM DUAL) AS WRHS_SE_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_PLT_BX_NM('B', pt0.BX_KND, pt0.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS BX_KND_NM
FROM ( SELECT SIP.APC_CD AS APC_CD , SIP.WRHSNO AS WRHSNO , SIP.INPT_SN AS INPT_SN , SIP.INPT_YMD AS INPT_YMD , SIP.FCLT_CD AS FCLT_CD , SIP.QNTT AS QNTT , SIP.WGHT AS WGHT , SIP.SORTNO AS SORTNO , SIP.SORT_CMNDNO AS SORT_CMNDNO , SIP.RMRK AS RMRK , RM.PLTNO AS PLTNO , RM.WRHS_YMD AS WRHS_YMD , RM.PRDCR_CD AS PRDCR_CD , RM.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , RM.VRTY_CD AS VRTY_CD , RM.GDS_SE_CD AS GDS_SE_CD , RM.WRHS_SE_CD AS WRHS_SE_CD , RM.WAREHOUSE_SE_CD AS WAREHOUSE_SE_CD , RM.BX_KND AS BX_KND , RM.GRD_CD AS GRD_CD FROM TB_SORT_INPT_PRFMNC SIP , TB_RAW_MTR_INVNTR RM
WHERE SIP.APC_CD = RM.APC_CD AND SIP.WRHSNO = RM.WRHSNO AND SIP.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND SIP.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND SIP.INPT_YMD = #{inptYmd}
AND SIP.FCLT_CD = #{fcltCd}
AND SIP.SORTNO IS NULL --AND RM.INPT_PRGRS_QNTT > 0
AND SIP.SORTNO IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY INPT_YMD, FCLT_CD, WRHSNO ) pt0
